entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
